nodes.bodyText: As doc, it appears better to use dependency instead of current, though latter is widely used for other packages.

nodes.bodyText: got it. current we're talking about isn't same thing :) . current for me is latest released version. In original context of the comment, it's current in development version. While our believe is same: let's use the latest released one: 2.0.0-beta.3.
